article_title: What has been happening in Israel and Gaza?
sentence: Three  people  were  killed  and  several  others  injured  when  two  Palestinian  gunmen  opened  fire  at  a  bus  stop  in  West  Jerusalem  on  Thursday.

article_title: What has been happening in Israel and Gaza?
sentence: The  perpetrators  were  killed  at  the  scene  by  off-duty  soldiers;  Hamas  claimed  the  attack.
